rule_formulation.true: The sentence is written in german and does not contain the word 'deutsch'.
rule_formulation.false: The sentence is written in a language other than german.

true_samples: Dies ist ein Text auf Deutsch
Guten Tag! Wie kann ich Ihnen helfen?
false_samples: The recipe for this delicious pasta dish is written in Italian
The tour guide explained the historical facts in Spanish
The email from my colleague was written in French
I found an interesting article written in Mandarin
My friend sent me a greeting card with a message written in Portuguese
